title: Grand Opening: Boutique Kakadu National Park Luxe Eco-Villa Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Yellow River Cruise
description: Discover the ancient landscapes and eternal spirit of Kakadu National Park in unparalleled bush luxury with an eco-villa stay at Yellow Water Villas at Cooinda Lodge, Kakadu, perfectly positioned adjacent to the renowned, bird-filled billabong wetlands of the same name. Boasting just five boutique villas - each sensitively procured and sustainably constructed - there’s no finer place to discover the UNESCO World Heritage-listed region’s rich tapestry of ever-changing country. After days spent cruising through the glasslike Yellow Water or admiring Kakadu’s rich and storied rock art, return to Mimi’s Restaurant for locally foraged, sustainable bush flavours with modern flair, or head to Barra Bar for ice-cold beer or a delicious drop of red.
location_description: Yellow Water Villas at Cooinda Lodge, Kakadu
offer_address: Kakadu National Park, Kakadu Highway, Jabiru 0886, Northern Territory, Australia
